content: i would like to revisit some devdays recordings, however i get an error message when i want see them again. e.g. Jose IG Publisher https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hfdn_202011/Agenda/1251963 https://us02web.zoom.us/rec/share/y1_OpzUMTuQwIodBG9MgrvirLbu3UWUJ6BAz0uA8ulZvtcFbwcRbjj6xXbwLijlO.qOyzdIi6v69eG4j5 gives a zoom error This recording does not exist. (3,301), are they available on another location or is it a zoom problem?
The recordings are available on the HL7 Education Portal (they expire in Whova after a while).
From the HL7 website, go to Training, then "Education on Demand" I think the one you're looking for is https://www.pathlms.com/hl7/courses/20733.
@Lynn Laakso thanks for the information, i'm looking for the november edition, in earlier years they were for the participant also available to view via vimeo
@Oliver Egger Hi Oliver, please have a look at https://www.devdays.com/events/devdays-virtual-edition-november-2020/videos/

You should have received the access details in an email titled 'FHIR DevDays November 2020 videos and slides are now available! :computer:' on Dec 2. If not you can reach out to the email mentioned there.
I've already gotten the info from Marita, but wanted to note that I didn't receive that message either (just double checked).

@Gino Canessa Thanks for mentioning this. It seems in sending out DevDays mails we've respected an unrelated Unsubscribe from you for a Firely newsletter. We'll fix that going forward!
(btw, Oliver did receive it, but email overload makes it easy to miss too)
